title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the separates variables

1 point is earned for the antiderivative of dy term

1 point is earned for the antiderivative of dx term

1 point is earned for the constant of integration

1 point is earned for the uses initial condition g(6) = -4

1 point is earned for solves for y

ydy=( 3−x )dx 1 2 y 2 =3x− 1 2 x 2 +C 8=18−18+C;C=8 y 2 =6x− x 2 +16 y=− 6x− x 2 +16 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWG5b GaamizaiaadMhacqGH9aqpdaqadaqaaiaaiodacqGHsislcaWG4baa caGLOaGaayzkaaGaamizaiaadIhaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaaca aIYaaaaiaadMhadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccqGH9aqpcaaIZaGa amiEaiabgkHiTmaalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaikdaaaGaamiEamaaCa aaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaadoeaaeaacaaI4aGaeyypa0Ja aGymaiaaiIdacqGHsislcaaIXaGaaGioaiabgUcaRiaadoeacaGG7a Gaam4qaiabg2da9iaaiIdaaeaacaWG5bWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaa aOGaeyypa0JaaGOnaiaadIhacqGHsislcaWG4bWaaWbaaSqabeaaca aIYaaaaOGaey4kaSIaaGymaiaaiAdaaeaacaWG5bGaeyypa0JaeyOe I0YaaOaaaeaacaaI2aGaamiEaiabgkHiTiaadIhadaahaaWcbeqaai aaikdaaaGccqGHRaWkcaaIXaGaaGOnaaWcbeaaaaaa@6AE0@
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the separates variables

1 point is earned for the antiderivative of dy term

1 point is earned for the antiderivative of dx term

1 point is earned for the constant of integration

1 point is earned for the uses initial condition g(6) = -4

1 point is earned for solves for y
